thread.title: Pamela Stablein
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Pamela Stablein

author: Pamela Stablein
title: Pamela Stablein
text:
I ordered the chocolate chip cheesecake for my son in Vail, CO for his birthday. He told me it arrived in excellent condition and that his dinner guest raved about it! They all said it was TOTALLY AWESOME!!!!
I will definitely order from your company again in the future.
